title: 構造体の配列 1
question: ???に入るのはなに
source:
<color=#da70d6>#include</color> <color=#ce9178><stdio.h></color>

<color=#c586c0>typedef</color> <color=#358cd6>struct</color> test<color=#ffd700>{</color>
  <color=#358cd6>int</color> x;
  <color=#358cd6>char</color> c;
<color=#ffd700>}</color>TEST;

<color=#358cd6>int</color> main<color=#ffd700>(</color><color=#358cd6>int</color> argc,<color=#358cd6>char</color>* argv<color=#ffd700>[</color><color=#ffd700>]</color><color=#ffd700>)</color><color=#ffd700>{</color>
  TEST list<color=#ffd700>[</color>5<color=#ffd700>]</color> = <color=#ffd700>{</color><color=#ffd700>{</color>1,<color=#ce9178>'a'</color><color=#ffd700>}</color>,<color=#ffd700>{</color>2,<color=#ce9178>'b'</color><color=#ffd700>}</color>,<color=#ffd700>{</color>3,<color=#ce9178>'c'</color><color=#ffd700>}</color>,<color=#ffd700>{</color>4,<color=#ce9178>'d'</color><color=#ffd700>}</color>,<color=#ffd700>{</color>5,<color=#ce9178>'e'</color><color=#ffd700>}</color><color=#ffd700>}</color>;
  TEST *p;
  p = list;
  printf<color=#ffd700>(</color><color=#ce9178>"%d"</color>,<color=#ff0000>???</color><color=#ffd700>)</color>;
  <color=#c586c0>return</color> 0;
<color=#ffd700>}</color>
